description: Configure the Azure Virtual Machine Scale Set diagnostics extension.

commands.name: az vmss diagnostics get-default-config
commands.summary: Show the default config file which defines data to be collected.

commands.name: az vmss diagnostics set
commands.syntax:
az vmss diagnostics set --resource-group
                        --settings
                        --vmss-name
                        [--no-auto-upgrade {false, true}]
                        [--no-auto-upgrade-minor-version {false, true}]
                        [--protected-settings]
                        [--version]
examples: az vmss diagnostics set --protected-settings {protected-settings} --resource-group MyResourceGroup --settings '{"commandToExecute": "echo testing"}' --vmss-name MyVmss
